data.text: @simonwoodworth Kindly refer to the link provided: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH (Click on "To the baggage status website). We do hope that your baggage will be located and delivered to you promptly. Kind Regards, Sam.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @simonwoodworth In the vast majority of cases, the missing baggage is found and delivered within 24 hours. Note that once your missing baggage is reported, you will then be issued with a baggage reference number which you may use to trace your baggage on the website.

@simonwoodworth Hi Simon, we regret that your baggage was lost during transportation with SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience experienced in this regard. Please be advised that if you still have yet to receive your baggage, you will need to report this directly to the Lost and Found desk.
@DenysVitali We may then send a request to the relevant department once again. Kind Regards, Sam.

@DenysVitali Hi Denys, we sincerely apologize for the delay in time it has taken to respond to your request. As advised earlier by one of our colleague's, your invoices had been sent to the email that was on the reservation. However, do let us know if you still have not received it yet.
@Ronninglife We do hope that your baggage will be located and delivered back to you soon. Kind Regards, Sam.

@Ronninglife Furthermore, you will need to be provided a baggage tracing reference number upon reporting your missing baggage. With the baggage reference, you may then be able to trace your baggage on the website via the link provided: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @Ronninglife Hi Ron, thanks for reaching out to us. We regret that your baggage was lost during transportation with SWISS and apologize for any inconvenience experienced in this regard. Kindly note that you will need to contact the lost and found desk of your arrival airport for assistance.

@SusanBeaupre Hi Susan, We are so sorry to learn about the circumstances surrounding your experience with us and we apologize. However, if you would like to file a formal complaint, you may do so via the following link. https://t.co/xJCD4MDfpU. Kind regards, Angie.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @BrunoLauper Thank you for the update. Kind regards, Joe.
@AboveBracknell Hello, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Joe.
@Fly_BOAC @Birdseed501 Thanks for the update. Kind regards, Joe.
@Niyi_ju1law @lolitagift @bod_republic Hello! how can be of assistance to you? Kind regards, Joe.

@RachelKelly_3 @DameDaisyDoo @MENnewsdesk @TUIUK @manairport @swissair Hello Rachael, thank you for your message. We really do apologize to hear about your luggage and we will do our best to help you with this. If you are not able to lodge your report please provide us with your reference number through private message. Kind regards, Joe.
@CleveOrchestra Hello we are more than happy to have you flying with us. SWISS looks forward to welcoming you back onboard sometimes soon. Kind regards, Joe.
@SecretFlying @FlyingBrussels Hello Secret flying, thanks for the information. Kind regards, Joe.

@DomJulitaur Hello we really do apologize for the inconvenience caused during your trip. Please be advised that you need to file a report on our website so our relevant department can handle your situation accordingly on https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI Kind regards, Joe.

urls.title: Complaints and compliments | Customer Service | SWISS
urls.description: SWISS greatly values good service and high standards of quality. If we ever fail to meet your expectations please inform us accordingly.

data.text: @MichalVrtiak Hello please be advised that we are currently having technical difficulties for the time. You can try again within the next hour. Kind regards, Joe.
@ipigorpetrov hello thanks for the update. Kind regards, Joe.
@whats_above_SE1 Hello thank you for the updates. Kind regards, Joe.
@Shakeelrabbaney Your most most welcome Shakeel, should you have any further queries or request please do not hesitate to contact us. May you have a pleasant day further. Kind regards, Joe.
@15below_travel Thank you for your message, we hereby are more than happy for the support and being part our journey. Kind regards, Joe.
@Shakeelrabbaney Okay then now with the reference number generated from your report you will need to use that to check your report status on https://t.co/MI4iX5go92 Kind regards, Joe.

data.text: @Nellallata @DublinAirport @nellallata Thank you for your response, please be advised that we have relayed this to the relevant department. You should be contacted once we have an update. Kind regards, Joe.

@hoeppi92 @hoeppi92 thank you for your response, be advised that were having a few technical difficulties. If your still unable to check-in within the next hour then you will need to check in at the airport 3 hours before your departure time. Kind regards, Joe.
@PGurney_ @pgurney_ hello, thank you for your kind response. We look forward to welcoming you back onboard sometime soon. Kind regards, Joe.
@mxh030 @mxh030 hello, would you please elaborate on the situation so we can assist accordingly. Kind regards, Joe.
@Deco20Fitz You will be contacted once we have an update to your baggage. Kind regards, Joe.

@javed_vora Hello again Mohamed, we really apologize for causing you this much tension and frustration. Should you wish to lodge a complaint please find the form on the link provided https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI Kind regards, Joe.

data.text: @NftSizzle @nftsizzle thank you for your kind response. We would like to extend our sincere apologies to hear the type of treatment you received from our colleague. Please be informed that we have a complaint form on our website where passengers can file a complaint on.

@hitenkash Hi Hitendra, thank you for your message. We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. Be advised that you can send your feedback to our customer feedback department by filling the form at https://t.co/JXJm2A9Zfx. Kind regards,Vernon.

data.text: @NftSizzle @nftsizzle Hi, thank you for your message. Swiss apologize for the frustration and inconvenience that went through. How can we further assist you? Kind regards, Joe.

@Deco20Fitz If you have not received your bag, we kindly request you to contact the lost and found department at your arrival airport to confirm the status of your bag. You can also check on the baggage tracer online which is available on the link: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH. Regards, Flora.

urls.title: Problems with your baggage
urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @Deco20Fitz Hi, We are truly sorry to hear that your travel bag is lost. Please be advised that you may submit the form provided here: https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI for the cost reimbursement of toiletries due to the delayed bag.

data.text: @MT82612810 Hi, please contact the lost and found department at your arrival airport to organize the delivery of your bag. Kind regards, Flora.
@shanesbyrne Hi, please be advised that you will need to contact your travel agent directly for your refund. Kind regards, Flora.

@ece_aydin1 Hi, we are truly sorry to learn that your bag is lost. We kindly request you to keep in contact with the lost and found department at your arrival airport for updates on the delivery of your bag. You can also check on the baggage tracer on the link: https://t.co/Jkvr8c50nH.

urls.description: Report immediately to the Lost & Found office if upon arrival, your baggage is damaged, too late, or you never get it back.

data.text: @MatiaSantaValle Hi Matias, we are truly sorry to learn that your bag is lost. Have you reported the missing bag to the lost and found office at your arrival airport? Kind regards, Flora.
@MT82612810 Once you have filled out the form provided above, our customer feedback department will be in contact with you directly. Kind regards, Flora.

@MT82612810 Kindly note that the lost and found department at the airport is in charge of delayed bags for the first 5 days. If you still have not received your bag, you will need to contact the lost and found department directly. You can also keep checking on the baggage tracer.
@sergedroz Hi Serge, please be advised that you have been notified via private message. Kind regards, Sana.

@MT82612810 Hi, we are truly sorry to hear that your travel bag is lost. Please be advised that you may submit the form provided here: https://t.co/OzQK8DKxHI for the cost reimbursement of toiletries due to the delayed bag.

data.text: @jpirtle209 Hi Josh, we assure you that our customer feedback team will review your complaint and escalate your case accordingly. We sincerely apologise that we not able to provide a specific timeframe as to when they will update you. Rest assured they will respond to you directly.

data.text: @jpirtle209 Hi Josh, thank you for your message. We kindly request that you contact the airport of arrival for any update on the luggage. Kind regards, Vernon.
@jkinel12305 Hi jkinel12305, please, can you provide your booking code via private message. Kind regards, Vernon.
@jkinel12305 Hi jkinel12305, thank you for your message. Please be advised that we have responded to you via private message. Kind regards, Vernon.
@ravichoyal26 Hi Ravindra, thank you for your message. Please be advised the relevant department contact you directly once they have completed reviewing your case. Kind regards, Vernon.

@gcpanday Hi again, there will be an update as soon as your baggage is checked in. It might take a few days, I am really sorry that this happened to you. I absolutely understand your displeasure. Best wishes, Jason.
@EXYUaviation @exyuaviation hi, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Vernon.

@gcpanday Hello Gautam, I am truly sorry to hear about this. You can track your luggage with the case number you've already received. I really hope your baggage will arrive as soon as possible. Best wishes, Jason.
@ItsRisai Hi Risai, thank you for the update. Kind regards, Vernon.
@AnishaP47192574 Hi Anisha, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we may have caused. Please be advised that we have assisted you via direct message. Kind regards, Noah.

data.text: @RolfWeidmann @iamMonac0 @LH9713 @MarcFelixSerrao Hallo Rolf, es tut mir leid dass deine letzten 10 Flüge allesamt unpünktlich waren.
